snippet.title: Tribes of Midgard – Survival Mode Update | Animated Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy Tribes of Midgard today! 
www.tribesofmidgard.com/buy 

Animated Survival Trailer made in collaboration with @TitmouseInc 

Read More about the update to Survival Mode: https://www.tribesofmidgard.com/2022/08/season3_survivalupdate/

Midgard is hotter than ever with a GIANT update to Survival Mode included with the Season 3: Inferno Saga update.  

Looking to explore and conquer Midgard without the pressure of Ragnarök? Look no further than our revamped survival mode! Don’t worry about threats coming to you - instead, take the fight to the enemy, explore at your own pace, build impressive structures, and level up on your timeline. 

Gather your tribe in Tribes of Midgard, a 1-10 player co-op action survival RPG. The Survival update will be released with Season 3: Inferno Saga on August 16. For the first time, Xbox X|S, Xbox One, and Nintendo Switch Vikings are joining the tribe with PlayStation 4, Playstation 5, and PC players via EGS and Steam. 

“Surthrive” the Viking way in Tribes of Midgard, a multiplayer, action-survival RPG of gigantic proportions. 

Follow Tribes of Midgard on social media:
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/tribesofmidgard 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/tribesofmidgard 
Instagram: https://www.Instagram.com/tribesofmidgard 
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/tribesofmidgard 
Website: https://www.tribesofmidgard.com
